title: reflect: lacking documentation and test for InterfaceData
body:
by **cgmurray**: 
It would be really helpful with improved documentation of reflect.InterfaceData and in
particular an explanation of the purpose of the function. 
Even though neither reflect nor the memory representation of an interface is part of the
language specification[1] the function is part of the public api. 
A test that demonstrates a typical use-case of reflect.InterfaceData could also
complement the documentation.

[1] According to answers in
https://groups.google.com/forum/?fromgroups=#!topic/golang-nuts/kt7J4C2lOzA
